name: CSC8503 Coursework prt 1
text: Walk around a nav mesh world, in this ‘Pikmin’ inspired course work. Create your cat swarm by gathering kittens and throw them at dangerous geese wandering around the world. Main features: Collision, physics, state machines, boids, path finding, nav mesh, and light netcode. Youtube video: https://youtu.be/ZxK5PkyDek4
